basicInfo.name: Espada
basicInfo.flavor: Espada's demon blood makes her far more powerful than any average human. Ironically, she wishes to use this power to kill demons, which earned her the title \"Demon Hunter.\

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Purging Shot
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 340% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Magic Vulnerability. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Magic Vulnerability to 33%.

Skill 2.name: Goddess's Judgment
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Consumes 4 stack(s) of [Purified Magic] to deal additional damage equal to 26% of the target's Max HP. [Limit: 1300% of Espada's Attack]
 - Deals damage equal to 425% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 515% of Magic Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Damage: To 32% of the target's Max HP. (HP-based damage limited to 1600% of caster's Attack)

Passive.name: Purified Magic
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Purified Magic when 1 enemy falls in battle. [Max 4 Stack(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Magic Damage Boost to 10%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 29% Magic Resistance. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Members of the Holy Cross Crusaders, Orly, Aquila, stew, fruits, cats, good fashion, listening to music
profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, Dellons, medicine, obtuseness, demons, cowardice, recklessness
profile.story: Abandoned as a child, Espada trained with the Crusaders from an early age, specializing in using pistols and broadswords to eradicate demons. She has now risen to the rank of special agent.

basicInfo.name: Espada
basicInfo.flavor: One of Espada's missions failed badly, leading to the death of most of her comrades, and causing demon blood to fuse with her own. Since then, others have kept their distance from her.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Purging Shot
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 305% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Magic Vulnerability. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 305% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Goddess's Judgment
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Consumes 4 stack(s) of [Purified Magic] to deal additional damage equal to 20% of the target's Max HP. [Limit: 1000% of Espada's Attack]
 - Deals damage equal to 380% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 380% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Purified Magic
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Purified Magic when 1 enemy falls in battle. [Max 4 Stack(s)]
